roleset.name: Natural Disaster: landslide

example.text: 33 dead after 10,000 tonne landslide in Guatemala
a shallow translational landslide (with a volume of about 104 m3) affected the slope, thus completely destroying the already constructed structures.

roleset.note: Added by Julia in a Natural Disaster roleset endeavor. Comparison to avalanche, mudslide, rockslide, lahar.
